channel.title: Npc direction help (one small error) rep for reward
channel.description:
i have every almsot perfect i have no errors but this when i run the server [code]-------------------------------------------------------------------------------- - - - starting Server - - - -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- [Shamon King]: Starting Shamon Scape on 0.0.0.0:43594 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 11 at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:1906) at NPCHandler.(NPCHandler.java:23) at server.main(server.java:33) [/code] what its saying is that it can not find the integer 11 in line 1906 heres the line
newNPC2(Integer.parseInt(token3[0]), Integer.parseInt(token3[1]), Integer.parseInt(token3[2]), Integer.parseInt(token3[3]), Integer.parseInt(token3[4]), Integer.parseInt(token3[5]), Integer.parseInt(token3[6]), Integer.parseInt(token3[7]), Integer.parseInt(token3[8]), [b]Integer.parseInt(token3[11])[/b], GetNpcListHP(Integer.parseInt(token3[0])), true);
i have it declared in there but it cant read it ive added other things to but i dont want to release cus theres so many leechers or does the 11 mean what space it is in? im alittle confused at this point cus im not quiet sure how to fully use tokes

item.title: Npc direction help (one small error) rep for reward
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

i have every almsot perfect i have no errors but this when i run the server

[code]--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

  •                                                                          -

  •                          starting Server                                 -

  •                                                                          -

[Shamon King]: Starting Shamon Scape on 0.0.0.0:43594
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 11
at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:1906)
at NPCHandler.(NPCHandler.java:23)
at server.main(server.java:33)
[/code]

what its saying is that it can not find the integer 11 in line 1906
heres the line

newNPC2(Integer.parseInt(token3[0]), Integer.parseInt(token3[1]), Integer.parseInt(token3[2]), Integer.parseInt(token3[3]), Integer.parseInt(token3[4]), Integer.parseInt(token3[5]), Integer.parseInt(token3[6]), Integer.parseInt(token3[7]), Integer.parseInt(token3[8]), [b]Integer.parseInt(token3[11])[/b], GetNpcListHP(Integer.parseInt(token3[0])), true);
i have it declared in there but it cant read it ive added other things to but i dont want to release cus theres so many leechers

or does the 11 mean what space it is in?
im alittle confused at this point cus im not quiet sure how to fully use tokes

Read full topic
item.source: Npc direction help (one small error) rep for reward
